009
010package Ch25_SiftFeatures;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.awt.Font;
014import java.awt.Shape;
015import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
016import java.awt.geom.QuadCurve2D;
017import java.util.List;
018
019import ij.IJ;
020import ij.ImagePlus;
021import ij.ImageStack;
022import ij.gui.Overlay;
023import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
024import ij.gui.TextRoi;
025import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
026import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
027import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
028import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
029import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDescriptor;
030import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDetector;
031import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftMatch;
032import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftMatcher;
033
034/**
035 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the SIFT detection and matching
036 * framework. The plugin takes a stack of at least 2 grayscale images, finds 
037 * interest points in the first 2 images and determines the best matches between
038 * feature points.
039 * To display the results, the two input images are mounted side-by-side
040 * in a combined image and the best-matching features are connected.
041 * Vector overlays are used to draw the results on top of the images.
042 * 
043 * @author WB
044 * @version 2016/01/05
045 */
046public class Sift_Matching_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
047
048        static int NumberOfMatchesToShow = 25;
049        static double MatchLineCurvature = 0.25;
050        static double FeatureScale = 1.0;
051        static double FeatureStrokewidth = 1.0;
052
053        static boolean ShowFeatureLabels = true;
054
055        static Color SeparatorColor =   Color.black;
056        static Color DescriptorColor1 = Color.green;
057        static Color DescriptorColor2 = Color.green;
058        static Color MatchLineColor =   Color.magenta;
059        static Color LabelColor =               Color.yellow;
060        static Font LabelFont = new Font(Font.SANS_SERIF, Font.PLAIN, 12);
061
062        ImagePlus imp = null;
063
064        @Override
065        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
066                this.imp = imp;
067                return DOES_8G + PlugInFilter.STACK_REQUIRED + NO_CHANGES;
068        }
069
070        @Override
071        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
072                if (imp.getStackSize() < 2) {
073                        IJ.error("Stack with at least 2 images required!");
074                        return;
075                }
076
077                ImageStack stack = imp.getImageStack();
078                final int w = stack.getWidth();
079                final int h = stack.getHeight();
080
081                FloatProcessor Ia = stack.getProcessor(1).convertToFloatProcessor();
082                FloatProcessor Ib = stack.getProcessor(2).convertToFloatProcessor();
083
084                SiftDetector.Parameters params = new SiftDetector.Parameters();
085                // modify SIFT parameters here if needed
086
087                SiftDetector sdA = new SiftDetector(Ia, params);
088                SiftDetector sdB = new SiftDetector(Ib, params);
089
090                List<SiftDescriptor> fsA = sdA.getSiftFeatures();
091                List<SiftDescriptor> fsB = sdB.getSiftFeatures();
092
093                IJ.log("SIFT features found in image 1: " + fsA.size());
094                IJ.log("SIFT features found in image 2: " + fsB.size());
095
096                // --------------------------------------------------
097
098                IJ.log("matching ...");
099                // create a matcher on the first set of features:
100                SiftMatcher sm = new SiftMatcher(fsA);
101                // match the second set of features:
102                List<SiftMatch> matches = sm.matchDescriptors(fsB);
103
104                // --------------------------------------------------
105
106                ImageProcessor montage = new ByteProcessor(2 * w, h);
107                montage.insert(stack.getProcessor(1), 0, 0);
108                montage.insert(stack.getProcessor(2), w, 0);
109                ImagePlus montageIm = new ImagePlus(imp.getShortTitle()+"-matches", montage);
110
111                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
112                oly.add(makeStraightLine(w, 0, w, h, Color.black));     // vertical separator
113                int xoffset = w;
114
115                // draw the matched SIFT markers:
116                // TODO: convert to CustomOverlay !
117                int count = 1;
118                for (SiftMatch m : matches) {
119                        SiftDescriptor dA = m.getDescriptor1();
120                        SiftDescriptor dB = m.getDescriptor2();
121                        oly.add(makeSiftMarker(dA, 0, 0, DescriptorColor1));
122                        oly.add(makeSiftMarker(dB, xoffset, 0, DescriptorColor2));
123                        count++;
124                        if (count > NumberOfMatchesToShow) break;
125                }
126
127                // draw the connecting lines:
128                count = 1;
129                for (SiftMatch m : matches) {
130                        SiftDescriptor dA = m.getDescriptor1();
131                        SiftDescriptor dB = m.getDescriptor2();
132                        oly.add(makeConnectingLine(dA, dB, xoffset, 0, MatchLineColor));
133                        count++;
134                        if (count > NumberOfMatchesToShow) break;
135                }
136
137                // draw the labels:
138                if (ShowFeatureLabels) {
139                        count = 1;
140                        for (SiftMatch m : matches) {
141                                SiftDescriptor dA = m.getDescriptor1();
142                                SiftDescriptor dB = m.getDescriptor2();
143                                String label = Integer.toString(count);
144                                oly.add(makeSiftLabel(dA, 0, 0, label));
145                                oly.add(makeSiftLabel(dB, xoffset, 0, label));
146                                count++;
147                                if (count > NumberOfMatchesToShow) break;
148                        }
149                }
150
151                if (oly != null) {
152                        montageIm.setOverlay(oly);
153                }
154                montageIm.show();
155        }
156
157        // drawing methods -------------------------------------------------
158        
159        private ShapeRoi makeStraightLine(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, Color col) {
160                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();
161                poly.moveTo(x1, y1);
162                poly.lineTo(x2, y2);
163                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(poly);
164                roi.setStrokeWidth((float)FeatureStrokewidth);
165                roi.setStrokeColor(col);
166                return roi;
167        }
168
169        private ShapeRoi makeSiftMarker(SiftDescriptor d, double xo, double yo, Color col) {
170                double x = d.getX() + xo; 
171                double y = d.getY() + yo; 
172                double scale = FeatureScale * d.getScale();
173                double orient = d.getOrientation();
174                double sin = Math.sin(orient);
175                double cos = Math.cos(orient);
176                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();      
177                poly.moveTo(x + (sin - cos) * scale, y - (sin + cos) * scale);
178                //poly.lineTo(x, y);
179                poly.lineTo(x + (sin + cos) * scale, y + (sin - cos) * scale);
180                poly.lineTo(x, y);
181                poly.lineTo(x - (sin - cos) * scale, y + (sin + cos) * scale);
182                poly.lineTo(x - (sin + cos) * scale, y - (sin - cos) * scale);
183                poly.closePath();
184                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(poly);
185                roi.setStrokeWidth((float)FeatureStrokewidth);
186                roi.setStrokeColor(col);
187                return roi;
188        }
189
190        private ShapeRoi makeConnectingLine(SiftDescriptor f1, SiftDescriptor f2, double xo, double yo, Color col) {
191                double x1 = f1.getX(); 
192                double y1 = f1.getY();
193                double x2 = f2.getX() + xo; 
194                double y2 = f2.getY() + yo;
195                double dx = x2 - x1;
196                double dy = y2 - y1;
197                double ctrlx = (x1 + x2) / 2 - MatchLineCurvature * dy;
198                double ctrly = (y1 + y2) / 2 + MatchLineCurvature * dx;
199                Shape curve = new QuadCurve2D.Double(x1, y1, ctrlx, ctrly, x2, y2);
200                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(curve);
201                roi.setStrokeWidth((float)FeatureStrokewidth);
202                roi.setStrokeColor(col);
203                return roi;
204        }
205
206        private TextRoi makeSiftLabel(SiftDescriptor d, double xo, double yo, String text) {
207                double x = d.getX() + xo; 
208                double y = d.getY() + yo; 
209                TextRoi roi = new TextRoi((int)Math.rint(x), (int)Math.rint(y), text, LabelFont);
210                roi.setStrokeColor(LabelColor);
211                return roi;
212        }
213
214}
